snippet: CHAE--Dr. Hi-Kyung, 76. Born December 9, 1939 in Seoul, Korea. At Rest March 11, 2016 in Los Angeles. Dedicated spouse to Inja. Loving Dad to Esther and Brian. Proud Grandpa to Evon. Best Brother. Loyal friend. Mentor to so so many. Professor. Businessman. Scholar. Journalist. Swimmer. Ice hockey Player. Golfer. Fisherman. Singer. Drinker. Dancer. Impish Humorist. Film Buff. Poet. Gentleman. Pen name: Hundreds of Ideas Flowing like Rivers. Now his spirit stays within us and his body returns back to their stardust origins. 1/3
lead_paragraph: CHAE--Dr. Hi-Kyung, 76. Born December 9, 1939 in Seoul, Korea. At Rest March 11, 2016 in Los Angeles. Dedicated spouse to Inja. Loving Dad to Esther and Brian. Proud Grandpa to Evon. Best Brother. Loyal friend. Mentor to so so many. Professor. Businessman. Scholar. Journalist. Swimmer. Ice hockey Player. Golfer. Fisherman. Singer. Drinker. Dancer. Impish Humorist. Film Buff. Poet. Gentleman. Pen name: Hundreds of Ideas Flowing like Rivers. Now his spirit stays within us and his body returns back to their stardust origins. 1/3
